data.meta_description: An important part of travelling is making sure you are able to bring the things you need. As Rome2Rio is not a transport operator or booking engine, always check with the transport provider* for more information regarding travelling with large or...
data.text:
An important part of travelling is making sure you are able to bring the things you need. As Rome2Rio is not a transport operator or booking engine, always check with the transport provider* for more information regarding travelling with large or extra luggage, pets, bikes and other sports equipment etc.

Fortunately our key flight booking partner, Skyscanner, has created a search box that can help you find the contact details for airlines and travel agents listed on their site. This is a great resource to help you locate more information directly from airline operators. You can find the search box here.

Our key booking partner for other forms of transport, Omio, also has a resource for operator policies. You can find the Travel Companies page here.
